mapper.select: SELECT cb.id, cb.owner, cb.name AS `CHAT_BOT_NAME`, cm.id AS `MODE_ID`, cm.name AS `MODE_NAME`, v.id AS `VOICE_ID`, v.name AS `VOICE_NAME`, f.id AS `IMAGE_FILE_ID`, f.file_path AS `IMAGE_FILE_PATH`, f.owner AS `IMAGE_OWNER`, f.content_type AS `IMAGE_CONTENT_TYPE`, f.url AS `IMAGE_URL` FROM chat_bot cb JOIN chat_mode cm on cb.mode_id = cm.id LEFT JOIN voice v on cb.voice_id = v.id LEFT JOIN file f on cb.image_file_id = f.id WHERE cb.owner = #{owner}

SELECT cb.id, cb.owner, cb.name AS `CHAT_BOT_NAME`, cm.id AS `MODE_ID`, cm.name AS `MODE_NAME`, v.id AS `VOICE_ID`, v.name AS `VOICE_NAME`, f.id AS `IMAGE_FILE_ID`, f.file_path AS `IMAGE_FILE_PATH`, f.owner AS `IMAGE_OWNER`, f.content_type AS `IMAGE_CONTENT_TYPE`, f.url AS `IMAGE_URL` FROM chat_bot cb JOIN chat_mode cm on cb.mode_id = cm.id LEFT JOIN voice v on cb.voice_id = v.id LEFT JOIN file f on cb.image_file_id = f.id WHERE cb.owner = #{owner} AND cb.id = #{chatBotId}
SELECT text FROM chat WHERE bot_id = #{chatBotId} AND owner = #{owner} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, bot_id AS `chat_bot_id`, text, IF(is_bot , 'true', 'false') as `is_bot`, create_date, owner FROM chat WHERE bot_id = #{chatBotId} AND owner = #{owner} ORDER BY create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(bot_id, text, is_bot, create_date, owner) VALUES(#{botId}, #{text}, #{isBot}, NOW(), #{owner})
INSERT INTO chat_bot(mode_id, voice_id, owner, image_file_id, name) VALUES (#{modeId}, #{voiceId}, #{owner}, #{imageFileId}, #{name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_bot WHERE id = #{chatBotId} AND owner = #{owner}
DELETE FROM voice WHERE id = #{voiceId} AND owner = #{owner}
